signature: TransformedSortedBag<E> transformingSortedBag(SortedBag<E>, Transformer<? super E, ? extends E>)

direct_enhancements.method_name: transformedSortedBag(SortedBag<E>, Transformer<? super E, ? extends E>)
direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods transform a SortedBag using a Transformer, but transformedSortedBag also transforms existing elements.

direct_enhancements.method_name: transformingBag(Bag<E>, Transformer<? super E, ? extends E>)
